</ul></div>
</li>
<li id="menu-item-22995" class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-22995"><a href="http://pyeong-an.com/%ec%83%9d%eb%aa%85%ec%9d%98-%ec%8b%9c%eb%83%87%ea%b0%80/"><span>생명의 시냇가</span></a></li>
</ul></div></nav>			</div>
		</div>

		<div class="cart-dropdown hidden">
	<div class="cart-dropdown-inner">
		<a class="vamtam-cart-dropdown-link icon theme" href="#">
			<span class="icon theme">&#57453;</span>
			<span class="products cart-empty">...</span>
		</a>
		<div class="widget woocommerce widget_shopping_cart">
			<div class="widget_shopping_cart_content"></div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
					<div class="search-wrapper">
				
<button class="header-search icon wpv-overlay-search-trigger">&#57645;</button>			</div>
		
			</div>
</div>	</header>

	</div><!-- / .fixed-header-box -->
<div class="shadow-bottom"></div>

			<div class="pane-wrapper clearfix">

							<div class="row">
								<div class="row "><div class="wpv-grid grid-1-3  wpv-first-level first unextended" style="padding-top:0px;padding-bottom:0px" id="wpv-column-febed35afa24c2fab762a44cb223be50" ><div class="push" style='height:10px'></div><h5 style="color: #ffffff;">© 당진 평안교회 | since 1999.</h5><div class="push" style='height:10px'></div></div>

<div id="wpv-overlay-search">
	<form action="http://pyeong-an.com/" class="searchform" method="get" role="search" novalidate="">
		<input type="text" required="required" placeholder="Search..." name="s" value="" />

<script id='wpvpm-menu-item' type='text/html'><li>
	<% if(children.length > 0) { %>
		<a href="#" class="has-children <%= _.escape(classes.join(' ')) %>" title="<%= _.escape(attr_title) %>"><%= title %></a>
		<div class="mp-level">
			<div class="mp-level-header">
				<h2><%= title %></h2>
				<a class="mp-back" href="#"><%= WpvPushMenu.back %></a>
			</div>
			<ul>
				<% if(! (/^\s*$/.test(url)) ) { %>
					<li><a href="<%= _.escape(url) %>" class="<%= _.escape(classes.join(' ')) %>" title="<%= _.escape(attr_title) %>"><%= title %></a></li>
				<% } %>
				<%= content %>
			</ul>
		</div>
	<% } else { %>
		<a href="<%= _.escape(url) %>" class="<%= _.escape(classes.join(' ')) %>" title="<%= _.escape(attr_title) %>"><%= title %></a>
	<% } %>
</li></script><script id='wpvpm-menu-root' type='text/html'><nav id="mp-menu" class="mp-menu">
	<ul>
		<%= content %>
	</ul>
</nav>
</script>		<script>
		( function ( body ) {
			'use strict';
			body.className = body.className.replace( /\btribe-no-js\b/, 'tribe-js' );
		} )( document.body );
		</script>
